languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, перед нами необычное скопление двойных астероидов, богатых редкими металлами и ценными минералами. Согласно телеметрии, все они движутся по довольно устойчивой орбите, что позволяет предположить о возможности возведения в потоке астероидов добывающей станции".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, перед нами необычное скопление двойных астероидов, богатых редкими металлами и ценными минералами. Согласно телеметрии, все они движутся по довольно устойчивой орбите, что позволяет предположить о возможности возведения в потоке астероидов добывающей станции".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, перед нами необычное скопление двойных астероидов, богатых редкими металлами и ценными минералами. Согласно телеметрии, все они движутся по довольно устойчивой орбите, что позволяет предположить о возможности возведения в потоке астероидов добывающей станции".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of twin asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the stream."

"Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of twin asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the stream."

"Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."

"Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."

"Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous nous trouvons à proximité d'une formation inhabituelle d'astéroïdes binhaires, riches en métaux rares et en minéraux précieux. Puisqu'ils suivent une orbite relativement stable, la construction d'une station minière paraît envisageable. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous nous trouvons à proximité d'une formation inhabituelle d'astéroïdes binhaires, riches en métaux rares et en minéraux précieux. Puisqu'ils suivent une orbite relativement stable, la construction d'une station minière paraît envisageable. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们发现了一个相当不寻常的双体小行星群，富含稀有金属与贵重矿物。这些小行星在相当稳定的轨道上移动，我们说不定可以在这里建造一座采矿站。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们发现了一个相当不寻常的双体小行星群，富含稀有金属与贵重矿物。这些小行星在相当稳定的轨道上移动，我们说不定可以在这里建造一座采矿站。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, vor uns befindet sich ein ungewöhnlicher Cluster binärer Asteroiden, reich an seltenen Metallen und wertvollen Mineralien. Sie bewegen sich in einem relativ stabilen Orbit, es könnte also möglich sein, innerhalb des Drifts eine Bergbaustation zu errichten."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, vor uns befindet sich ein ungewöhnlicher Cluster binärer Asteroiden, reich an seltenen Metallen und wertvollen Mineralien. Sie bewegen sich in einem relativ stabilen Orbit, es könnte also möglich sein, innerhalb des Drifts eine Bergbaustation zu errichten."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, tenemos un extraño grupo de asteroides binarios delante que contienen metales raros y minerales valiosos en abundancia. Siguen una trayectoria orbital bastante estable, lo que sugiere la posibilidad de construir una estación minera en el interior del cúmulo».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, tenemos un extraño grupo de asteroides binarios delante que contienen metales raros y minerales valiosos en abundancia. Siguen una trayectoria orbital bastante estable, lo que sugiere la posibilidad de construir una estación minera en el interior del cúmulo».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、目の前の珍しい二重小惑星の星団は、レアメタルや貴重な鉱物を豊富に持っています。かなり安定した軌道の上を回っているので、その流れの中で採掘ステーションを建設できる可能性がありそうです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、目の前の珍しい二重小惑星の星団は、レアメタルや貴重な鉱物を豊富に持っています。かなり安定した軌道の上を回っているので、その流れの中で採掘ステーションを建設できる可能性がありそうです」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, önümüzde ender metaller ve değerli mineraller bakımından zengin bir ikili asteroit kümesi var. Nispeten istikrarlı bir yörünge içinde hareket etmekteler, bu da yüzeylerinde maden istasyonları inşa etmemizi mümkün kılıyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an unusual cluster of binary asteroids before us, rich in rare metals and valuable minerals. They are moving in a fairly stable orbit, which suggests the possibility of constructing a mining station inside the drift."
